name: Vikings II
description:
Shoot your way through legendary creatures and become the best archer!
Fenrirs, Giants, Dragons, Serpents, Kraken, Trolls, Vikings Raiders, Odin, Demons...
Beat them, gain gold and train your chosen Viking to give him a chance to join the sacred halls of Valhalla.


Key Features:
- Choose your Viking & train him to reach the Valhalla.
- Explore beautiful worlds and defeat hundreds of legendary monsters
- Hundreds of levels and engaging obstacles to defeat

- Level-up and increase your stats to become stronger
